title: Clementine Apparel - Girls and Women Dance Bra with Clear Detachable Straps Unpadded & Seamless
descriptions:
Clementine Apparel - Girls and Women Dance Bra with Clear Detachable Straps, Unpadded & Seamless (Nude)

Overview:
Perform with confidence in this no-show dance bra designed for girls and women. Featuring clear, detachable, and adjustable straps, it stays virtually invisible under costumes while providing secure, comfortable support for competitions, practice, and active pursuits.

Key Features:
- Clear, detachable straps: Customize your look and support while keeping a low profile under any costume.
- Adjustable fit: Straps adjust for a personalized, secure fit that moves with you.
- Seamless construction: Smooth, no-show design disappears under leotards and performance wear.
- Unpadded comfort: Lightweight feel with supportive coverage that won’t add bulk.
- Backless-friendly: Ideal for open-back costumes and stage outfits.
- Color: Nude, made to blend under most skin-toned garments.

Best For:
- Ballet and other dance forms
- Dance competitions and practice
- Cheer, gymnastics, and active movement

Why You’ll Love It:
This comfortable, secure, and virtually invisible bra is made to perform. The seamless, unpadded design ensures a smooth silhouette, while the clear detachable straps offer styling versatility without compromising support.

Care:
Hand wash cold and lay flat to dry to maintain clarity and elasticity of straps.

Fit Notes:
True to size. If between sizes or preferring a more secure feel, consider sizing down.
